root:
^Kattara: 
 So if you don't want them to come over and punish you then you better leave now while you can

^Bandit 2 : 
 Yeah, The Rama is only a legend, Nothing more...

^Kattara: 
 You won't get this deer!, Me and my brother hunted this animal!

^Bandit 1 : 
 Don't worry!, We only came here to find the village you live in so we can grab some fortune

^Bandit 2 : 
 Yeah!, so point us to the right direction kid and we will you leave alone

^Kattara: 
 That's my home!, YOU WILL NOT PASS FROM HERE!

^Bandit 1 : 
 It seems we've got a stubborn one, Right Boss?

^Boss: 
 You have one chance to tell us where your village is or I will smash that tiny head of yours

^Kattara: 
 Don't think just because you are big that you can have what you want here!

^Kattara: 
 My brother will still make you regret coming here!

^Boss: 
 HAHA! I would like to see that brother of yours so I can smash his head too!

^Boss: 
 He is still smaller than me!

^Brother: 
 I'm not tiny, you are just too big...

^Boss: 
 Another prey to fall by MY HANDS!

^Brother: 
 I don't go by a name...
